body_html: Haven't found the source of the issue yet, but I originally thought it might be something with contiguous tensors. Replacing out = out.transpose(1, 2) with out = out.transpose(1, 2).contiguous() reduced my Conv + GRU time from 40s to 20s which is interesting.
body_text: Haven't found the source of the issue yet, but I originally thought it might be something with contiguous tensors. Replacing out = out.transpose(1, 2) with out = out.transpose(1, 2).contiguous() reduced my Conv + GRU time from 40s to 20s which is interesting.
body: Haven't found the source of the issue yet, but I originally thought it might be something with contiguous tensors. Replacing `out = out.transpose(1, 2)` with `out = out.transpose(1, 2).contiguous()` reduced my Conv + GRU time from 40s to 20s which is interesting.
